import React, {useEffect,useContext} from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { Menu, Dropdown,Avatar, Image,Badge } from 'antd'; import 'antd/dist/antd.css'; import { LoginOutlined,TeamOutlined,ShoppingCartOutlined,UserOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import {GlobalState} from '../../GlobalState'; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' function Header(){ const state = useContext(GlobalState) console.log(state) const auth = useSelector(state => state.auth) const {user, isLogged} = auth useEffect(() => { const script = document.createElement('script'); script.src = 'js/index.js'; script.async = true; document.body.appendChild(script); }); const menu = ( }> Sign In }> Sign Up ); const menu1 =( Profile Sign Out ); const normal = () =>{ return <>
} /> } />
} const userLink =() =>{ return <>
} />
} return ( <>

{ isLogged ? userLink() : normal() }
); } export default Header;
